bibl.title: Sullivan v. Marsh. From the Petitioner Attorney
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: according in the best of the knowledge and belief of this complainant the said Dan Sullivan is that on the 9th day of June A.D. 1884 in said County & Territory before are V.D. Lay a Justice of the Peace in and for said county & Territory the said Dan Sullivan was counseled of the crime of Petit Larceny and upon such conviction the said V.D. Lay the said Justice of the Peace is aforesaid did adjudge and determine that the said Dan Sullivan be imprisoned in the County Jail for the period of sixty days (60)
4 That the illegality of said restraint & imprisonment considers in this That the commitment uncle while the said Dan Sullivan is held is not directed to my Sheriff or other office
Second said commitment does not specify the County in which said Jail was wherein the said Dan Sullivan should be imprisoned & restrained
Third That the said Justice exceeded
